docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v1 is deprecated. Please use v2. If you still need to use v1, you may do so by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: build_pxe_default

apis.short_description: Change the default PXE menu on all configured TFTP servers

examples:
GET /api/config_templates/build_pxe_default
200
PXE Default file has been deployed to all Smart Proxies
